reviewText: One of the better Shaw Brothers films, with intense competition and deception between martial groups in South China. A northern expert comes to find the best club in town. Of course courtesy and honor are the requisite traits of true masters!

The quality of this Celestial Pictures presentation is 5/5.... upscaling this remastered edition looks almost like Blu-ray. (Sadly, the  Weinstein presentation looks like a VCD put onto a DVD in comparison).
This version does NOT have english track
This version IS region 3 as it notes
The audio track is outstanding!
